title: TAW wants you!
body:
Finding a new clan is like looking for a new home. You want it to be a warm and fun place where you feel welcome. You may as well think of it as a second family to enjoy a past time with.

TAW (The Art of Warfare) is broken up into several divisions in which their members participate in weekly scheduled training/practice matches and internal tournaments. We also frequently play against other clans/gaming groups when the interest arises. Each game we play hosts its own mini-clan that operates within the whole of TAW making us the large community we are. From FPS games to MMORPGs - you name it - we have it all.

Here in the League of Legends division we welcome all players from the casual to the competitive. TAW holds League of Legends practices twice a week over TeamSpeak. Community members are divided into squads of up to 5 which are kept as consistent as possible every week, and are led by an experienced "Squad Leader".

The League of Legends Division of TAW is broken into 4 Battalions. Europe Nordic and East, Europe West, North America and of course Oceania, each using their respective servers. The practice times are:

Battalion 1 North America East: 
Mon & Wed 21:00 EST 

Battalion 2/3 Europe Nordic-East/West:
Sun & Wed 20:00 CET 

Battalion 5 Oceania:
Tues & Thurs 19:30 AEST

What sets us aside from other gaming communities?

It's our Code of Ethics and our Chain of Command (CoC). Every member in TAW (just as a fun tip – we are now 2300+ members out of which a grand number of around 200 members are just in the LoL Division) abides by our [Code of Ethics](http://taw.net/wikis/welcome/our-code-of-ethics.aspx).

If you are interested in becoming a member of our growing organization which has been around for 10+ years, you will find TAW to be a welcoming and accepting group of good folks who just want to enjoy the gaming experience.

Make sure you have the following:
A Working Mic
[TeamSpeak 3](http://www.teamspeak.com/?page=downloads)
Proficient in the English Language

To apply go to www.taw.net and click on [Apply](https://taw.net/themes/taw/user/application.aspx) in the top right corner.

Make sure to check your e-mail regularly for updates on your application. Don’t forget to check your spam folder.

For additional information check out our [Website](http://taw.net/) or our [recruiting banner](http://Url=http://pub.taw.net/GameFiles/LL/recthread_dark.png).
